word:
As I have seen in you, my poor boy, a disposition to disobedience, I have also seen a yielding to temptation to deceive us. You would have plans formed which you would keep secret from your father and mother, fearing that you would meet opposition in some of your projects or fond plans, and when 


                                    -174- 

questioned you have evaded or thrown a different shade upon and around the matter under inspection. . . .
